message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to purchase this item at a special introductory price of $12000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to someone with your discerning taste and needs.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the special price, I'm looking to spend closer to $10000.  Would you be willing to consider a price of $10500?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering your interest, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $11000 for our premium product. I hope this aligns better with your budget.
